body:
# Accounting Legal Reports
## Situation:
Huge companies generates big transactions.
Such transactions can go up to a million accounting entries.
OpenERP legal reports are slow on generation of this legal reports.
## Solution:
Created a module that will show the reports on an OpenERP View.
Using SQL, generate the required records.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Account reports
